mapper.select: SELECT e.info, e.name AS empName, e.tel, e.email, e.password, e.emp_no, e.work_type, e.img, e.join_date, d.name AS deptName, p.name AS posiName, j.name AS jobName, e.img FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no LEFT JOIN positions p ON e.posi_no = p.posi_no LEFT JOIN jobs j ON e.job_no = j.job_no WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET info = #{info}, name = #{empName}, tel = #{tel}, img = #{img}, password = #{password} WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
